Audio.Locality: Agua Blanca, about 10 km NE, Portuguesa
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural vocalizations (song?) from pair. Excited, one would jump into the air as the other flared its tail and wings while singing this duet from small trees on grassy slope.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Phacellodomus inornatus,Columbina talpacoti,Gallus gallus,Myiarchus tyrannulus,Crotophaga ani,Troglodytes aedon
